title: Dreros
description: An ancient Greek settlement near modern Neapoli in the Lasithi region of Crete (about 15km northwest of Agios Nikolaos).

properties.description: Surveyed by eye in Google Earth on September 27, 2012 at an eye altitude of 4395 feet. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Centerpoint of visible remains of Dreros (approx.)
